title: JSC Sivershchyna And Slobozhanshchina Directions Rusyan Army Shelled Khrynivka, Mountain, Mhah, Timonovichi, Kostobok, Mihaltz ...
content: At sivershchyna and slBozhanschyna directions Russian Army Shelled Khrinivka, Hirsk, MKHY, TYMONOVYCHI, KOSTOBRIV, MYKHALCHYNA SLOBODA OFERNA. Rativka, Veselivka, Basivka of Sumy Region, Veterynarne, Borysivka, Ambarne, Strilecha of Kharkiv Region. Russian Aviation Conduched Aircrakes at Kharkiv Region and Kharkiv City, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine Says in the Evening Report
author: Live UA Map
